title: Broken In
description: GAY BDSM EROTICA. In this fourth book, leatherman Jake Heller continues to transform 25-year-old Lucas Devero from alpha techie hottie into his personal boy. Jake shows Lucas that nothing is off limits if the leatherman wants it. And Lucas learns that his new submissiveness doesn't end at the doorway to Jake's dungeon. The tables are turning in all areas of the young hottie's life. WARNING: HARDCORE ACTION
author: S.F. Tanner
